NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Turning on location services will allow us to send you drivers that are nearby when you request a ride.
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We use background location to send you nearby ride requests when you are in movement.
NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We use background location to send you nearby ride requests when you are in movement.
NSLocationUsageDescription: Turning on location services will allow us to send you drivers that are nearby when you request a ride.
